channel.title: How do I change amount of exp given?
channel.description:
How can I change it so it makes it harder to riase your levels? Just need to know how to change Attack, Strength, Defence, Mage, Range, & Prayer.
Got another one now.
What file would I find objects and where there placed at in?? I wanna move a few but can't find the right file.[br][size=1]Posted on: June 17, 2007, 10:05:07 PM[/size][hr]Come on....

item.title: How do I change amount of exp given?
item.dc:creator: @bmxr4c3r709 bmxr4c3r709
item.description:
@bmxr4c3r709 wrote:

Okay, I changed everything but mage, what do I search for, for that? Cause it’s not like your hitting something…

Read full topic

item.title: How do I change amount of exp given?
item.dc:creator: @the_angel_of_death the angel of death
item.description:
@the_angel_of_death wrote:

you can find this all in ur client.java and you just change the xxp amount given *player level[0] or whatever number in [] is.

Read full topic
